attributes.action: invest in making breathalyzer's easily and cheaply available
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With many people drinking the night before, or having the one or two pints before driving many dont know what their body can take.  By making breathalyzer's available in places such as toilets for only a few pounds, people will be able to know when they are legally allowed to drive.
